modName: One-Eye - Mads Mikkelsen - Valhalla Rising Follower
summary: Adds a follower to the sleeping giant inn in riverwood named One-Eye based on Mads Mikkelsen in the movie Valhalla Rising.
descriptionHtml:
This is just a follower meant to look like Mads Mikkelsen in his role of One-Eye in the movie Valhalla Rising. The Follower is 100% Mute just as he is in the movie. Find him in the sleeping giant inn in riverwood.

This is a follower that will be in an upcoming mod of mine based around bandits/slavers/slaves (he is a slave in the movie). So enjoy it, and hopefully the full bandit mod will be released within a few days.


Requirements: Updated Skyrim

Credits:
FranklinZunge for the armor - Colovian Leather Armor
Misanthropia for his axe - Viking Weaponry
Northborn for his scars - Northborn Scars

Permissions:
PM me if you want to use him, depending on your desired use I may or may not let you.
author: Saint Grimm
